amendment.description: An amendment numbered 130 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit funds from being used to implement Order Number 3946-2017 allowing Department of Justice components and agencies to forfeit assets seized by State or local law enforcement agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A122) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A122) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A122) offered by Mr. Raskin.
